column5: Picked up half a dozen Luhr Jensen Laxee spoons in different colurs at Sail in Burlington today, on sale for $2 a piece.  They are slimmer spoons like a Krocodile (a little wider), about 3" long and 3/4oz.  Silver plated too so they will have that whiter flash as compared to nickel plated spoons.  Anyone ever used them?  Not much info when Googled...  I am going to give them a shot off the piers.  Burt
Those are sweet Kevin.   Nice pier chucking lures.
I've never used the spoons, so I'm no help, the UV paint might be good in low light conditions  How many did they have left? I'm passing by Brant St tomorrow
I had to dig through a bin of Shoehorn spoons to find them, gotta be more down there lol....  Burt
